name: Joy Life 3
description:
Game introduction

You have just joined the 100% Hotel. Joy is a popular person in the underground dance party. She is very beautiful and takes good care of you.
However, she and Ovie have a very good relationship, and they often get tired of being together, but recently, because of you, the two have begun to show signs of loosening up.
You just occasionally dance, chat, and hold hands with Joy for a drink.
"Oh, I really didn't expect Sister Ovie to be really angry..."
"...don't pay attention to her"

Gameplay

Joy Life 3 is still a casual flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated. When all the cards in the picture are eliminated, that is You can enter the next level!
